purpose: Defines the structured requirements for post-SIH/Post-RRP forensic analysis, outlining the mandatory data fields from NRALS/FSVM required to generate remediation and recovery instructions.

core_requirements.name: Isolation State Reporting
core_requirements.mandate: Formal definition of the isolation boundary (scope of contamination/rollback) established during the halt.

core_requirements.name: Recovery Criteria Integration
core_requirements.mandate: Specify the minimum criteria required for system resumption, mandatory external sign-off requirements, and authorized restart paths.
